item.title: yea yea yea. i will update my blog..
item.description: heh. yea so my friends have “caught” me. busted for sure: [@vanwinkle] is harper giving up blogging? [clock] yeah I think so its been forever [@vanwinkle] whatever happened to three post per day minumum? [@scottv] he got a job So basically I have been just chilling out hard. not doig anything. I get home and I don’t play computer or anything. I really should. I have so many projected that I should finish.
